GeneDef.label: self-repairing apparel
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this genes have special archites that repair apparel.\n\nThis cannot repair the apparel to a better state than when it was last put on.

GeneDef.label: indestructible apparel
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this genes have special archites that prevent their worn gear from being damaged by repairing it nearly instantly.\n\nIt cannot repair the gear to a better state than when it was put on.
